input.sentences: ice sculpting is a unique art and sport .
people gather from all over to compete and watch master sculptures create art from huge blocks of ice .
every detail is important . this sculpture uses a small pick to inscribe small details .
piece by piece the artist chips away at his canvas .
in the end | hard work is rewarded by the satisfaction of creating something unique . a price here and there also makes competing fun .
output.sentences: Today was a nice snow day.
We decided to go out and see some snow sculpters being made.
It was amazing to watch the detail that went into them.
I loved seeing how great the items lookes.
My fav was an owl, what a day!
